text: Michael Bublé and his wife, Luisana Lopilato, are expecting their third child, Us Weekly can confirm. The singer ’ s rep confirmed the good news and according to reports in Lopilato ’ s native Argentina, the actress, 30, is about two and a half months along in her pregnancy. The happy news comes after a heartbreaking year that saw the couple ’ s eldest son, Noah, 4, battle cancer. He was diagnosed with liver cancer in November 2016 and the singer, 42, and his wife put their careers on hold while their little boy underwent treatment.
